sentence.Network_en: If you will just sign here, we will arrange for your bank to deduct your payments automatically.
sentence.Network_cn: 麻烦您在这里签一下字，我们将联系您的银行自动扣除您的付款。

sentence.Network_en: In special cases, a husband can deduct the travel expenses of his wife who accompanies him on a business trip.
sentence.Network_cn: 在特殊情况下，丈夫可以扣除陪同出差的妻子的旅费。

sentence.Network_en: It is not the bank's policy to deduct interest on withdrawals.
sentence.Network_cn: 提款需扣除利息这并非是本银行的政策.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 扣字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 扣杀〖 smash(theball)〗 扣除〖 deduct〗 扣发〖 deprive〗.
BEC中级、高级考试词汇超值下载篇-BEC商务英语 ... decrease v. 减少 deduct v. 扣除，减去 default n. 违约，未履行.
职称英语A级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... deduce v. 演绎，推断 deduct vt. 扣除，减除 deed n. 行为，契约，事迹，证书.
翻译硕士（MTI）经典素材-新词新译（3）_新东方在线 ... 特警 regimental police 提成 deduct 梯队 echelon.

list.abs: 今天整理的问题是关于免赔额（deductible）、起赔额（excess）还有保险金额（sum insured）的关系。关于免赔额和起赔额的关系…
自付额(DEDUCTIBLES)自付额是指如发生碰撞险或盗抢险后，客人需要承担的部分上限。
如同演绎（deduction）一样，归纳（ induction，正是学习器所做的） 起到知识杠杆的作用 —— 它将少量的输入知识转化成为大量的 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... deduce v 推论，演绎 deduction n 推论；减法 induce v 劝诱，诱导.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... deduction test 演绎测验 deductive 演绎的 deductive argumentation 演绎论证.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin deduct- 'taken or led away', from the verb deducere. Deduct and deduce were not distinguished in sense until the mid 17th cent

entry.def: When you deduct an amount from a total, you subtract it from the total.

example.ex: The company deducted this payment from his compensation...
example.tran: 公司从他获得的赔偿金中扣去了这笔付款。

example.ex: Up to 5% of marks in the exams will be deducted for spelling mistakes.
example.tran: 试卷中最多将会有 5% 的分数因为拼写错误而被扣掉。

means.word_mean: 2. retain and refrain from disbursing; of payments;
3. reason by deduction; establish by deduction

auth_sentence.content: Otherwise, he generally can't deduct the interest.
auth_sentence.res_content: Otherwise, he generally can't deduct the interest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Otherwise, he generally can't deduct the interest.

auth_sentence.content: Rather, they deduct them from the fund's total return.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rather, they deduct them from the fund's total return.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rather, they deduct them from the fund's total return.

auth_sentence.content: If you violate that rule, you typically can't deduct your loss.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you violate that rule, you typically can't deduct your loss.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you violate that rule, you typically can't deduct your loss.

sentences.en: My employer deducted ten pounds from my wages this week.
sentences.cn: 我的雇主从我本周的工钱中扣除了十英镑。

sentences.en: The cost of the breakages will be deducted from your pay.
sentences.cn: 损坏东西的费用将从你的工资中扣除。
